name: Cat-Eared Slime
text: Hello? Is that you out there Goo?

name: Cat-Eared Slime
text: I appear to have gotten myself stuck in this box.

name: Cat-Eared Slime
text: If you wouldn't mind helping me out of here, I'd be incredibly thankful to you.

name: Cat-Eared Slime
text: You know... not a lot of space in here... and it's... kind of dark..
